price: Wakusanyeni walio dhulumu, na wake zao, na hao walio kuwa wakiwaabudu.
arabic: ۞ ٱحۡشُرُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ وَأَزۡوَٰجَهُمۡ وَمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡبُدُونَ
footnotes: Enyi Malaika wangu! Wakusanyeni walio jidhulumu nafsi zao kwa kufuru, pamoja na wake zao wa kikafiri, na miungu yao waliyo kuwa wakiiabudu badala ya Mwenyezi Mungu, yakiwa masanamu au watu, na waonyesheni njia ya kwendea Motoni waingie humo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: uḥ'shurū alladhīna ẓalamū wa-azwājahum wamā kānū yaʿbudūna
